profile: Everything for your gameroom including fine Canadian made slate billiard tables, billiard accessories, pool and snooker cues. Fabulous selection of poker tables, table tennis or ping-pong, foosball, airhockey, and dome hockey. We also specialize in bars, bar stools, and bar-accessories. Also darts, poker chips, slot-machines, board-games, puzzles and everything FUN!

profile:
We offer satellite, HD tv, home-phone & Internet service in Scarborough with massive discounts & promos.

There has been recent upgrade in infrastructure in Scarborough to support our state of art fiber optics network to develop faster Internet, enhanced HD tv viewing and home phone.

Our technology caters to multi-cultural viewing needs, offering English, French, Hindi, Urdu, Bengali, Filipino, Arabic, Portuguese, Greek, Chinese  and Tamil language channels.

As a promo, we are currently offering the first 6 months on new homes free for all 3 services.

This is the best available technology, and superior to cable.

Enhance your home entertainment experience with professional installation by certified techs.
